content: **drops crochet cardigan in snow ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **size** s m l xl - xxl finished measurements bust 86-94-102-114-126 cm / 33-7/8 - 37 - 40-1/8 - 44-7/8 - 49-5/8 waist 80-88-98-108-120 cm / 31 5 - 33-7/8 - 38-5/8 - 42 5 - 47 25 hem 90-90-108-108-126 cm / 35-3/8 - 35-3/8 - 42 5 - 42 5 - 49-5/8 **materials** drops snow from garnstudio 300-350-350-400-450 gr nr 32 dark purple heather and use drops silke-tweed from garnstudio 100-100-100-150-150 gr nr 03 burgundy and use drops alpaca from garnstudio 100-100-100-100-150 gr nr 3800 raspberry and use drops vivaldi from garnstudio 50-100-100-100-100 gr nr 02 brown and use drops highlander from garnstudio 50 - 50 - 50 - 50 - 50 gr nr 14 red heather 5 drops wood buttons nr 538 drops 9 mm / us m/n crochet hook or size needed to obtain correct gauge drops 7 mm / us 10½ needles or size needed to obtain correct gauge crochet gauge 7 single_crochet/tc in width and approx 2 structure pattern row in height that is to say 1 row single_crochet + 1 row tc x 2 = approx 10 x 10 cm / 4 x 4 knit gauge 12 sts x 20 row with 1 strand alpaca + 1 strand silke-tweed + 1 strand vivaldi in stockinette st = 10 x 10 cm / 4 x 4
